attributes.action: Lower petrol prices and sort the dentist and doctors out
attributes.additional_details: Lower the prices of petrol instead of putting it up it's rediculous and do something about the dentist and doctors there's no point highlighting the problem do something about it
attributes.background: Not just me but every1 has had enough now of the petrol prices it's not the price of living it's called being greedy and taking the mickey out the public and as for the dentists and doctors something really needs to be done about it

rejection.details:
The Government is not directly responsible for the price of fuel, but you might like to sign the following petition:

Cap profit fuel forecourt operators can make on petrol and diesel to 10p/litre
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616956

Petitions also need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do in relation to doctors and dentists services. You might like to sign the following petitions:

Review accessibility to primary care and face to face appointments with GPs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615422

Increase funding to ensure all adults in England have access to an NHS dentist
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605814

In addition, we can't accept petitions started using a fake or incomplete name. People who create petitions are required to give their full, real name.
